> A fast version of the Rapid Automatic Keyword Extraction (RAKE) algorithm

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
if (!("devtools" %in% installed.packages()[,1]))
  install.packages("devtools")

devtools::install_github("crew102/rapidraker")
```
